com.mobius.vdrapi.callbacks
Interface INeedObjectWithOutputStream

All Known Implementing Classes:
CreatePageGroupCommand
public interface INeedObjectWithOutputStream

A class implements INeedObjectWithOutputStream to indicate that the class needs a callback of type IHoldOutputStream. The CreatePageGroupCommand object implements this interface, as it requires an output stream to which to write the downloaded page(s) it receives.

INeedObjectWithOutputStream is an alternative to INeedOutputStream. Classes that use script files with multiple CreatePageGroup commands should use INeedObjectWithOutputStream, as it allows them to create separate OutputStream objects for each set of downloaded pages. If both interfaces are implemented, a MultipleCallbacksSetException is thrown.

Method Summary
 void setObjectWithOutputStream(IHoldOutputStream objectWithOutputStream)
          Sets the callback object.
 

Method Detail

setObjectWithOutputStream

public void setObjectWithOutputStream(IHoldOutputStream objectWithOutputStream)
Sets the callback object. The caller of the CreatePageGroup command calls this method and passes it a reference to the object that implements IHoldOutputStream. The CreatePageGroup command can then call the appropriate methods in the IHoldOutputStream interface to get and set the output stream.

Parameters:
objectWithOutputStream - object that is called when the class implementing this interface either requires the current OutputStream or intends to set a new OutputStream.
